      Specify the fully qualified name of the ResultFactory to use.
      Viterbi.Builder<I,O,R> Viterbi.Builder.withThreadSafety()
      Makes it possible to execute viterbi from multiple threads without getting getting inconsistent results.
      Viterbi.Builder<I,O,R> Viterbi.Builder.withTimeLogging()
      Apply some naive time logging to stdout, possibly useful for testing.
